publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4748.1.2 Robert Brown: Decision on Abdelbaset Ali Mohmed Al Megrahi—As an amendment to amendment (S3M-4748.1) in the name of Richard Baker, after second "Libya" insert ", in particular the opportunities for compassionate release within Scotland; believes that the announcement should have been made to the Parliament rather than to a press conference; considers that justice and compassion for the victims’ families have not been served by this process;"
